attributes.action: Publicly accept responsibility for the 1917 Balfour Declaration
attributes.background: Britain gave support for what became Israel , without deliverance of protection for the indigenous people

rejection.details:
We are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

UK Governments have made statements on the Balfour Declaration, for example 100 years after it was made:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2017-10-30/debates/CB36ACC3-D2D7-441A-836B-736B8C869A13/BalfourDeclaration

We are therefore unclear what you mean by "publicly accept responsibility".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
